commands_tech_tab.oldClientDescription: Settings for the old Dota 2 6.84 client. Camera distance, useful commands, and more.
commands_tech_tab.setUpperFPS: Set the upper FPS limit (fps_max 0 to remove the limit completely)
commands_tech_tab.notReturnCameraOnSpawn: Do not return the camera to base on respawn
commands_tech_tab.forceRightClickAttack: Finishing off allied creeps with right-click
commands_tech_tab.increaseHeroIconsOnMin: Increase hero icons on the minimap
commands_tech_tab.consoleCommandSelfCast: This console command speeds up self-casting by double-tapping with Alt (do not set below 0.2!)
commands_tech_tab.copyFileWarning: We make a copy of this file just in case; if we make a mistake you can always restore the original version
commands_tech_tab.openFile: Open it with Notepad++ or another text editor/decompiler
commands_tech_tab.searchStandardCameraHe: We search for <distance>{{distance}}</distance> - this is the standard camera height.
commands_tech_tab.needsValueNearSearch: We need two values in the search: next to it will be
commands_tech_tab.changeToRequiredDistan: Change to the required distance (up to 1400) and save. We recommend a camera height of 1285 for those who find it very unfamiliar.
commands_tech_tab.saveFileRestartClient: Save the file, restart the client - the camera height should change
commands_tech_tab.replaceInGameFolder: The file needs to be replaced in the game folder
commands_tech_tab.quickCastsAndSelfCasti: Quick casts and self-casting via ALT
commands_tech_tab.checkSelfCasting: Enable the self-casting by double-tap option
commands_tech_tab.setKeyALT: In the 'Casting' tab set 'Key + ALT', switch to 'Quick casts' and set the same key
commands_tech_tab.colorSelectionAdvice: For color selection you can use
matchmaking_mode_description.1: Classic 5x5 rated All Pick. The rating changes with wins and losses and is used to balance teams in future matches.
matchmaking_mode_description.2: One-on-one mid lane game. A win is awarded after the opponent has two deaths or the destruction of their first tower.
matchmaking_mode_description.7: Tutorial mode against bots. Play with other newcomers and defeat the bots to access regular 5x5 matches.
matchmaking_mode_description.8: A mode for more experienced players who want to play a calm, high-quality game without leavers. The rating changes with wins and losses, and access opens after 30 matches.
matchmaking_mode_description.13: A simplified mode with fast leveling and plenty of gold. Great for learning or quick play.

dev_version_indicator.pleaseWait: For now you can take a look at these good folks, and the site will open as soon as it updates.
download_page.extractGame: Unpack the downloaded archive with the game, start Steam, and then run <dota>dota.exe</dota>
download_page.downloadingGame: While the game is downloading, join us at <telegram /> and <discord />! There's plenty of interesting stuff there, and they'll help you if you encounter any difficulties.
download_page.forPlayingWithPeople: A site was created for playing with people: you can't just press Search in the client itself, as it will start a search in the current version of the game.
download_page.cantJustSearch: That's why we have our own matchmaking, for which you need to <steamauth>authenticate via Steam</steamauth>. This is safe and required for finding online games.
download_page.steamAccountMustMatch: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> The Steam account for playing and the one on the website must match.
download_page.passTraining: You need to complete the training on the site: it's a normal game against bots. This will help you get used to the old Dota, get to know the original heroes and their abilities, and customize the game and keybindings to your preferences.
download_page.trainingProcess: Here's what you'll have to do:
download_page.serversInRussia: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> The gaming servers are located in the Russian Federation. Ukrainian players may benefit from a tool to bypass provider blocks.
download_page.setupSearch: <queue>Start searching for a game</queue> in mode <mode>{{mode}}</mode>
download_page.startGameClient: Launch Steam, then start the game client
download_page.connectButton: Join by clicking the button or using a console command
download_page.congratulations: Congratulations! You have completed your first online match! Now we’re waiting for you <queue>in search</queue> in mode <mode>{{mode}}</mode>
download_page.learnAbout: Meanwhile you can explore <history>match history</history>, <heroes>the strongest heroes</heroes>, or <leaderboard>the leaderboard</leaderboard>.
download_page.downloadLibraries: You also need to download libraries for your system and extract them into the game folder
download_page.forOldDota: To play the old Dota you need the old game client. This is not a mod: it's the real Dota from 2015.
download_page.dontClickMatchSearch: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> do not press the match search in the game itself

drop_list.howToFindTradeLink: How to find the trade link?
drop_list.donationInfo: Any player can donate items to the project on Steam. The bot will automatically calculate the value of the items and add them to your internal balance. This balance can be used to pay for a subscription!

error_page.pageLoadFailed: An error occurred while loading the page {{statusCode}}
faq.title: Common issues when playing Dota 2 6.84
faq.description: Problems with launching, configuring, and connecting to game servers
faq.items.version.title: Which game version is used?
faq.items.version.content.part1: We are playing on version 6.84c. This is the latest game version on
faq.items.version.content.part2: , as well as the most popular patch by player count.
faq.items.safe.title: Is it safe?
faq.items.safe.content.part1: The client was downloaded directly from official Steam depots, so it is fully authentic. The servers run on Valve's official tool — srcds.exe, as expected. Therefore bans are not possible.
faq.items.safe.content.part2: For site authentication, a secure Steam service using the OpenID protocol is used — it does not transmit login, password, or other personal data. This method has long been used on many third-party resources.
faq.items.ban.title: Can I play with a ban in Dota?
faq.items.ban.content.part1: Bans from the current Dota version do not apply to this client — they are not transferred here. But if you regularly leave games, spoil matches for others, or behave in a clearly toxic manner, you may receive a ban here. We monitor order and do not turn a blind eye.
faq.items.console.title: How to open the console?
faq.items.console.content: Bind it in the control settings and run the game via a batch file (the -console parameter is specified there)
faq.items.settings.title: My game settings reset / quick casts aren't working
faq.items.settings.content.part1: Disable Steam Cloud (for modern Dota and globally on Steam) and do not agree to synchronization. On the path
faq.items.settings.content.part3: in config.cfg file properties uncheck Read-only if present.
faq.items.connection.title: I can't connect to the game server
faq.items.connection.content.checkAccoun: Make sure the accounts on the site and Steam match.
faq.items.connection.content.ukraineNote: If you are from Ukraine or the previous methods did not help, try using tools to bypass ISP blocks.
faq.items.connection.content.internetNot: If you're already using it, try disabling it.
faq.items.connection.content.redownload: Redownload and re-pack the client using 7-zip.
faq.items.newDota.title: I get the new Dota opening, not the old one
faq.items.newDota.content.part1: Before connecting to the server, open the old client first. Enter the data from the table about the accepted game (format: connect ip) into the console and press Enter.
faq.items.clientLimit.title: Only one Dota 2 client per customer
faq.items.clientLimit.content.part1: Close the new or old Dota client if it's already running (kill the process via Task Manager). Only one Dota client can be running at the same time.
faq.items.dotaExeError.title: dota.exe not found
faq.items.dotaExeError.content.part1: You need to add 'cd ' at the start of the .bat file using Notepad.
faq.items.dotaExeError.content.path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Dota 6.84 (replace with the path to the old Dota client)
faq.items.launchError.title: The game isn't launching, what should I do?
faq.items.launchError.content.part1: Most likely you're missing something. Possible solutions:
faq.items.launchError.content.possibleSo: You haven't extracted the game archive and are trying to run the game from the archive. Extract the archive using 7-zip and run the game.
Try clearing Steam's download cache or switching the account before launching the old client.
If nothing helps – reinstall the operating system.
faq.items.steamClient.title: Steam client is missing or out of date
faq.items.steamClient.content.part1: One of the options below will help fix this issue:
faq.items.steamClient.content.solution4: Turn off Invisible mode in Steam
faq.items.steamClient.content.solution5: Run DOTA Classic and Steam as administrator
faq.items.launcherError.title: dota launcher DLL failed to load / Setup file 'gameinfo.txt' doesn't exist in subdirectory 'dota2'
faq.items.launcherError.content.part1: The game archive may not have extracted completely. We strongly recommend using 7-zip to extract.
faq.items.launcherError.content.part2: To fix it you need to avoid Russian/Cyrillic letters in the path or unpack the archive to the desktop. If that doesn't help, unpack the game archive to the root of drive C: or D:
faq.items.graphicsAudio.title: Graphics / Audio artifacts
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.driverIn: Reinstall the video driver, or install a newer version
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.audioRes: Run snd_restart in Windows command prompt or reinstall the audio driver
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.disableE: Disable all additional graphics options in the game settings
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.switchTo: Switch from integrated to discrete graphics card
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.ifNotHel: IF THE PREVIOUS DOES NOT HELP: enter commands one by one (checking the result after each command):
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.startupP: Use startup parameters in the bat file to set: -dxlevel 80, 81, 90, 95, 98 or -gl
faq.items.keybindAbility.title: Is there a way to enable stopping abilities with a separate key (for example, rearm on Tinker)?
faq.items.keybindAbility.content: No, there is no such feature.
faq.items.mouseBind.title: Is there a way to bind any function to the mouse wheel or remap camera movement?
faq.items.mouseBind.content: No, there is no such option.
faq.items.smartAttack.title: Can I enable "smart attack"?
faq.items.smartAttack.content: No, there is no such feature.
faq.items.lobby15.title: Is it possible to create a separate 5x5 lobby with the ability to choose mode and other parameters?
faq.items.lobby15.content.part1: Yes, this feature is available with a subscription
faq.items.lobby15.content.part3: or by agreement with the administration.
faq.items.meta.title: How can I study the meta of the old patch?
faq.items.meta.content.part3: on our site and go to
faq.items.replay.title: How to view a replay?
faq.items.replay.content.part1: On the page of the past match, click the "Download Replay" button. You will be redirected to a page with a detailed guide on how to view this replay, for example,

heroes.title: Heroes

info_page.seo.title: About the dotaclassic.ru project
info_page.seo.description: The current state of the project, who runs it, and a bit of history.
info_page.siteEssence: What is the purpose of the site?
info_page.onlineOldDotaExplanation: This site helps you play the old version of Dota 2 online. We offer Steam login, convenient game search, a link to the client, support, and useful materials about the version.
info_page.freeOldDotaOpportunity: We give everyone who wants the opportunity to play the old Dota online for free. If you violate the rules, we may disable access to the service.
info_page.differencesExplanation: The game now looks completely different from 10 years ago. Some people liked the changes, some did not, and we do not claim that the old version is the best. But trying the original can be interesting for everyone. Here's how they differ:
info_page.oldMapDetails: The old map has fewer neutral creep camps, Roshan on the river, side shops.
info_page.heroStatsDetails: Far less health and mana for heroes and more damage - having 700 HP at 15 minutes is normal. Any spell on the lane costs a lot of mana, but also deals a lot of damage. Spending a spell to last-hit a creep is a much more important decision.
info_page.originalHeroesDetails: Original heroes and their abilities — many abilities that in the current version either do not exist or have been significantly transformed. For example, Pudge here uses his second ability.
info_page.roleSeparationDetails: Strict role separation: the support needs to gank to earn money. There are far fewer creeps on the map, and kills give a bigger reward.
info_page.costToMaintainSite: How much does it cost to maintain this site?
info_page.expensesExplanation: The project has three expense items:
info_page.fixedExpenseDetails: Mandatory: rent for servers hosting the site and other infrastructure services (storage, analytics, databases). This part is almost fixed and costs about {{amount}} per month. In case of large influxes this part also has to scale; expenses increase to {{amount}} per month.
info_page.scalableExpenseDetails: Scalable: depending on online, we require a different number of game servers so there are enough slots for everyone. This expense is easy to predict: one optimal game server provides 3-4 parallel games and costs {{amount}} per month. If online is high, as during Pari Rivals 6.84, with around 180 parallel players — we get about 30 parallel games, so the server costs will be around {{amount}} per month.
info_page.advertExpenseDetails: Advertising: the most flexible part of expenses. Here we are highly dependent on market offers (which YouTubers are willing to cooperate for how much, for example), and, of course, our financial capabilities. We are always glad for new collaborations, and we do not refuse cheap advertising :)
info_page.approximateExpenses: In total, you can get approximate costs for maintenance: with low online of 5-10 parallel games, this is {{lowOnline}} per month. If online increases, advertising or a hype event triggers, costs can rise to {{highOnline}}.
info_page.projectHistoryExplanation: Classic Dota has passed through many hands: Western enthusiasts began hosting games in 2019. After that, there were two communities for quite some time: Western and CIS in the form of Discord servers. Then from 2021 to the end of 2024 all games were on the site https://dota2classic.com. From September 2024 to the present, all games are hosted on this site, by developers and supporters who are involved in:
info_page.communityManagerDetails: {{name}} - "community manager", public relations, advertising, reading long texts and generating smart phrases
info_page.wikiDeveloperDetails: {{name}} - developer of the wiki on items and heroes, the chief scapegoat of matchmaking experiments
info_page.contributorsList: List of people who contributed to the development of classic Dota:
info_page.ancient678Details: Ancient678 - created the CIS server for classic Dota
info_page.samovarDetails: The Samovar Man - thanks to him many players first saw classic Dota
info_page.sittingBullDetails: SittingBull - wrote the first automatic host servers via a Discord bot, wrote the first server plugins
info_page.deathTBODetails: DeathTBO - for years has been running dota2classic.com
info_page.alisonDetails: Alison - wrote many useful server plugins
info_page.konakonaqqDetails: konakonaqq - help with writing server plugins
info_page.otherContributors: Many others - hard to recall, but they were there and helped
info_page.finalGoal: What is the ultimate goal of the project?
info_page.stableOnlineGoal: Stable online that allows roughly in 10 minutes to find a balanced game with players of similar level at virtually any time of day. A cozy place where it will be interesting for everyone to play: both beginners to old Dota, and seasoned veterans. The project's maintenance is fully paid for by players, and there is a positive return for a stable stream of advertising.

player_settings.recalibrationDescription: Recalibration is a chance to reset your rating to the starting level and go through calibration again. It is suitable for those who are sure they deserve more or want to start from scratch. Recalibration can be used only once per season.
player_settings.avoidedPlayersInfo: Dotaclassic Plus subscribers can add up to one player to the avoided players list. This will prevent you from ever being matched with unpleasant players on the same team.
player_settings.connectTwitchProfile: Connect your Twitch profile to your account to unlock additional features!
player_settings.twitchBenefits: After linking, your profile will show a link to your stream, and in chat — a special icon that will mark you among other users. If you stream our game, we will automatically display a link to your live stream so viewers can easily find your channel. This is a great way to attract a new audience and make your stream more noticeable! 🎮📺
player_settings.twitchRequirements: for your stream to appear on the main page, the game must be Dota 2, and the title must include dotaclassic.ru
player_teammates.seo.title: {{player}}'s Teammates
player_teammates.seo.description: Players with whom {{player}} has a high win rate and many games
please_go_queue.queueInfo: There are already {{inQueue}} in the queue!
project_statistics.matchesDetails: Of them, more than 15,000 in 5x5 mode, 8,500 games with bots, 3,500 in 1x1 mode
project_statistics.contentCreators: In our project, content creators meeponegeroi, INBossik, Человек-Самовар, and many others also played
project_statistics.nostalgiaExperience: We strive to let everyone dive into nostalgia, or to try the original version of the game for the first time
queue_page.onboarding.gameModes.title: Game Modes
queue_page.onboarding.gameModes.content: Here is a list of modes available for finding a game. You can select several modes at once! To search for a 5v5 game, you need to win the training against bots.
queue_page.onboarding.party.title: Group
queue_page.onboarding.party.content: Here is your group: to invite a friend, click '+'
queue_page.onboarding.onlineStats.conten: Here you can see how many players are currently playing and how many are simply online
queue_page.onboarding.chat.title: General Chat
queue_page.onboarding.chat.content: General chat for all players — here you can report problems, and you'll get help.
queue_page.onboarding.searchButton.title: Search Button
queue_page.onboarding.searchButton.conte: When you choose a mode to search, press this button — the search for a game will begin.
queue_page.onboarding.adblock.title: Ad Block
queue_page.onboarding.adblock.content: Please disable ad blocking on this site. Although the game is completely free here, running the project still costs money. Have a great game!
queue_page.seo.title: Queue
queue_page.seo.description: Game search page for Classic Dota. Play in a group with your friends, bots, and other players

report_modal.commentPlaceholder: If you want the player to be punished, please specify what happened: behavior, quotes, moments from the match. Remember: frequent inaccurate or unfounded reports may disable the ability to submit reports.

steam_auth_error.steamNotResponding: Steam is currently not responding to authorization requests!
steam_auth_error.pleaseTryLater: Please try to log in again later.
steam_auth_error.steamSitesLostAccess: All sites accessible via Steam have now lost this ability.
steam_auth_error.soonFixed: We are confident that this will be fixed soon.
store_landing.title: dotaclassic plus
store_landing.subscriptionText: You help develop classic Dota: online activity is growing, matches are improving, and new features are being added. And you also receive nice privileges and exclusive features — as a token of appreciation for your support.
store_landing.profileDecorationText: Choose from a variety of styles, frames, and effects to express your character and stand out from others. Let your profile speak for you even without words.
store_landing.dodgeListText: Looks like you're back on the same team? Not today. Add the player to the dodge list — and you won't be on the same team anymore. Sick of the same 'match heroes'? Build your perfect lineup even with at least one side of the screen.
store_landing.unbanHeroText: Hero banned? That's not a reason to give up your favorite character. dotaclassic plus subscribers can choose banned heroes.
store_landing.inGamePraiseText: You can praise a teammate for hard work—or lightly tease an opponent for a fail. Just like in the current version. Added to bring a bit more emotion to classic as well.
store_landing.muteText: Do you no longer want to read messages, receive invites, or see others' comments on your profile? Block the player — and they will disappear from your gaming space. Peace of mind guaranteed.
store_landing.lobbyText: Gather your friends, pick a map, enable (or disable) bots, and decide for yourself how the match will go. Private game — your rules, your pace, your team.
store_landing.recalibrationText: Once per season you can reset your rating to the starting value and replay 10 calibration games. Maybe this time the system will understand who the real fighter for MMR is?
threads_table.author: Author
ticket_page.seo.title: {{title}}
tickets_page.seo.title: Support
vacancies_page.seo.title: Who we need
vacancies_page.seo.description: What talents the dotaclassic team needs
vacancies_page.projectNeeds: What talents the dotaclassic project needs
vacancies_page.projectIntro: The <project>{{project}}</project> project is sustained by the enthusiasm of people for whom old DotA is more than just a 'custom game'. We welcome any help, but, unfortunately, free of charge - the project is non-profit and all profits go to development.
vacancies_page.volunteerNote: All 'vacancies' imply no monetary compensation, but candidates are not expected to have outsized impact.
vacancies_page.productManagerDescription: Our project really needs a person who will guide product development. We have development resources, some analytics, but we devote too little time to working with users and are developing in an 'approximate' direction.
vacancies_page.contentManagerDescription: We have a Telegram channel, a Discord server, TikTok and YouTube - but there is very little content and it is not on a regular schedule. Developing a content plan, regularly posting to the channels - we simply lack hands for all this.
vacancies_page.productAnalystDescription: We have a metrics platform and analytics building, but lack professionalism. Forming analytical queries, building product dashboards in Grafana, and most importantly - understanding user behavior and forming hypotheses.
vacancies_page.frontendDevDescription: The main site is written in NextJS, but some components (for example, item previews) are written in Vue. Many interesting features await development, as well as refactoring of the existing codebase.
vacancies_page.uiDesignerDescription: The site has an embryonic style, but lacks a unified design system and structure. An experienced designer will help us achieve consistency, visual stability, and ease of use.
vacancies_page.devopsDescription: Support and enhancement of multiple VPS machines. Our main app runs in docker-compose, while game servers are run on separate smaller servers.
vacancies_page.backendDevDescription: The backend mainly consists of NestJS services communicating via REST, RabbitMQ, and Redis. Main tasks are implementing new features in existing services, creating new services, writing and maintaining integration and unit tests.
vacancies_page.srcdsDevDescription: A very specialized job - development and support of existing SourceMod plugins, configuring configs and working with other Source tools - Hammer and others.
vacancies_page.discordModeratorDescripti: We'd be happy to help set up the Discord server so it's easy to use, essential information is easily accessible to newcomers, and moderators can easily maintain order.
vacancies_page.contactInstruction: DM me on Telegram. Please specify what exactly you are interested in, and tell me about your experience — I would be very interested!
waiting_accept.searchingServer: We are searching for a game server...
waiting_accept.waitingForPlayers: We are waiting for other players...
